title: Cottontail Rengar
body: he will be in cotton with bunny ears and carrots as his weapon his bola will be an easter egg on a bola {{champion:107}}

replies.body: I think Hello Kitty Rengar would be better.  It'd just be rengar wearing a torn op Hello Kitty outfit.  Maybe the ult indicator could be Hello Kitty's head rather than the exclamation point.
